bibl.title: Notes sur quelques ostraca démotiques. À propos d'un ouvrage récent.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: S.P. VLEEMING, Ostraka varia. Tax Receipts and Legal Documents on Demotic, Greek, and Greek-Demotic Ostraka, chiefly of the Early Ptolemaic Period, from Various Collections = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVI (Leiden, 1994).
bibl.seg: DEVAUCHELLE Didier, Notes sur quelques ostraca démotiques. À propos d'un ouvrage récent.

Article compte rendu de: S.P. VLEEMING, Ostraka varia. Tax Receipts and Legal Documents on Demotic, Greek, and Greek-Demotic Ostraka, chiefly of the Early Ptolemaic Period, from Various Collections = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXVI (Leiden, 1994).
